history.narrative: Law 1-109 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-339, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 22, 1976 and December 7, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 4, 1977, it was assigned Act No. 1-194 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
